column4: Uncategorized;Phnom Penh: A 3 way accident occurred at 12:40 am
column9: Phnom Penh.------According to a source from the scene
column10: before the incident a white corolla 2K-3239
column11: heading south had a collision with a Tacoma
column12: 2Z-8191 and then hit a super luxury Rolls Royce.------The parties involved were negotiating
column13: but did not have enough money to settle the matter. The vehicles were taken to the traffic bureau of Phnom Penh
column14: waiting for a settlement.------https://khmer.social/news/9923?fbclid=IwAR1ds8UfWMQh5K_drudvKi_3GjU8bqXX2WXP_QbFplgvtBBE8n7VTcurAGA------b------ព័ត៌មានបឋម៖ រថយន្ត២គ្រឿងបុកគ្នាពេញទំហឹងបណ្ដាលអោយរងការខូចខាតយ៉ាងដំណំ រួចខ្ទាតទៅប៉ះរថយន្តមួយគ្រឿងទៀត។ ហេតុការណ៍នេះកើតឡើងនាវេលាម៉ោង២យប់ ឈានចូលថ្ងៃទី២៣ ខែ ធ្នូ ឆ្នាំ២០១៨
